name: Wild Wild West
description:
Are you the deadliest cowboy in the West? How will you become the best gun fighter in town?

Prove it in Wild Wild West! Be the fearless cowboy in his mission to wipe out this crazy invasion!

Our very Wild Western features:

+ Endless bad guys & bosses with many types of missions.
+ Tons of weapons to upgrade (gun,knife,war horse...).
+ Amazing retro graphics & musics.
+ Great & simple control.
+ If you think you're badass enough, unlock Survival Mode by completing Campaign Mode.
+ Game Center is fully supported.

BE WARNED: IT'S DEADLY ADDICTIVE!
